org.mmbase.util.transformers

Class Javascript

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mmbase.util.transformers.ReaderTransformer
      • org.mmbase.util.transformers.ConfigurableReaderTransformer
        • org.mmbase.util.transformers.Javascript
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, CharTransformer, ConfigurableTransformer, Transformer

    public class Javascript
extends ConfigurableReaderTransformer
implements CharTransformer
    Encodings related Javascript It can escape single quotes, by replacing them by \\', as is needed in document.write actions.
    Since:
    MMBase-1.7.4
    Author:
    Michiel Meeuwissen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
